extendedInfo.description: Creativity meets relaxation in this app that lets you build your own dream gardens from a large selection of hand-painted art. Design gardens that suit your style, mood and personality: overgrown or neat, sweeping park vistas or cozy flower corners, or even rugged wilderness! As you build your garden, animals and flowers will feel your love and come to your garden. Take pictures of them and grow your garden picture collection!   Share your gardens with friends via social networks or e-mail, set them up as a wallpaper etc. You can also use the app to sketch out garden design ideas.Perfect for daydreaming and relaxation, this is the one free gardening app that actually contains nothing stressful or distracting - there are no ads or purchase nags. Inner Garden, like real gardens, will help you - its gardener - to relax, calm down and focus at the same time. If you love nature and gardening and you want to create and share something personal and beautiful quickly and easily, your search ends here!FEATURES:* EXPANSIONS: Themed art packs (such as Desert Garden or Classic Garden) are available for download from Google Play.   * EASY GARDENING:  Simple and intuitive gesture controls are easy to master even for children or touchscreen newcomers. Full screen display allows for complete immersion in the peace and calm of your garden. Works equally well on all device sizes, from small phones to large tablets.* COLLECTIBLE CARDS: Collect pictures of real animals and flowers that appear in your garden over time! * REALISTIC, TRUE-TO-LIFE ART: Recognizable plant species will please both children and adults.  * COMPLETELY NON-TOXIC, SAFE FOR CHILDREN: Free of ads, nags or any kind of spam, this app treats its users with respect. No compulsive spending mechanics. * FULL UNDO HISTORY allows for completely stress-free creativity: no need to fear a mistake, everything can be undone, at any time. Feel free to experiment!* RANDOM GARDENS: When you start a new garden, it can be an empty plot of land, a pre-built example garden, or you can be inspired by asking for a random landscape. No "fear of the blank page"!PERMISSIONS:* STORAGE: needed for saving your gardens to SD card.* NETWORK COMMUNICATION (Full Internet Access): needed for error reporting and app usage statistics. The data collected this way are completely anonymous and strictly related to Inner Garden (crash reports etc.). Additionally, reporting can be turned off in the options.

reviews.comment: Excited about kindle fire edition. Makes my day. And I plan a buying all because they are great. I have my whole family into this app. Oh by they way how bought a bundle like grouped themes for discount price or buy one get one half off. Just a suggestion. Oh love the communication.
reviews.author: Sarah Hobbs

reviews.title: Re: please help (thx it worked)
reviews.comment: It works again, thanks. Btw i looked at ur other apps again. I still cannot bring myself to spend $6 on an app, but i,ll tell u what i wld do... i am interested in some of the elements from the architectural app. I wld pay $3.25 for half of the elements in that app. I would want the log cabin, the red bldg, the wishing well, one of the bridges and the wooden fence piece to b included in the half that i buy...and if i ever decide i want the other half you\'ll make $6.50 total vs $5.90.

reviews.title: Great but...
reviews.comment: Love the app but am having troubles with it force closing on me is it my phone?or a glitch in the app?

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: This app is awesome. It is fun and relaxing as well as easy to use.

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: This is definitely a great game that I\'ll recommend to everyone. It\'s relaxing, never lags n can give u the joy of having a huge garden without actually going through all the trouble. Keep up the good work!

reviews.title: HTC ONE niall h.
reviews.comment: Fab little app. Totally love this. Spend hrs designing my dream home in different settings. I have all the add ons and well worth the money. I would like to see one with people to place in the gardens,pools and vehicles fitting to the different environments. Well done you.love it.

reviews.comment: Well I\'m mostly putting the five stars for you communications and bonding with the users I\'m downloading it again coz I changed my phone but I love the idea... try makig somthing similar for a city or empire game (they are pretty popular now)

reviews.title: Really great work!

reviews.title: Love this game
reviews.comment: At first I play this game on tablet and now I play in this mini phone and still love it. Anyway inner garden should add more, like asia\'s plant or else. And maybe you guys should add weather, rain, snow, and other that would be great.. and maybe realtime effect so when night come, the garden become darker, so if we put lamp it will shine.. and my last idea is how about make this game into livewallpaper, so after we save our garden, it could be wallpaper. That\'s all I guess.. thanks for the amazing games..

reviews.title: Fustrated with moving screen.
reviews.comment: I just down loaded this game and so far I\'m loving it...but using 2 fingers to move the screen around is getting difficult and annoying...every time I try to move the screen I end up \"painting\" the ground something I don\'t want to....please help and have something else to move screen around...please...

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: Very relaxing and creative app. But PLEASE add more elements to the free version!! Like houses, fountains or wooden structures. I also think it should be a bit more accurate, I would give it 5 stars with more choice and accuracy

reviews.title: Super Awesome
reviews.comment: That Background Music is Sooooo Soothing...Thanks For making this beautiful app... :-D..5 out of 5 from me......

reviews.title: Great job.
reviews.comment: Creators, thank you. Truly, I really love this.  Update; Still an excellent program, the interface is so difficult & a bit seemingly tedious/random. No idea of others have remarked on the interface but please, maybe an update?
